title: MUTUAL FUNDS WEB APP
description: Developed a web app for mutual fund management with role-based access. Fund Managers can create mutual funds, while Investors can buy or sell them

title: BANK MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
description: Developed a web app for banking transactions like withdrawals, deposits and bank statements. Implemented OTP-based email verification for secure withdrawals.

title: E-COMMERCE WEBSITE
description: Website enables users to browse products, manage carts, and place orders securely using an payment gateway for safe and seamless online transactions.

title: PORTFOLIO WEBSITE
description: A responsive portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience, featuring clean design, contact form, and interactive sections to highlight my professional journey and work.
